ClientId: [Enter the Client Id of the service (Application ID obtained from the Azure portal), e.g. ba74781c2-53c2-442a-97c2-3d60re42f403]
AzureAdTenant: [Enter the domain of your tenant, e.g. contoso.onmicrosoft.com]
TenantId: [Enter 'common', or 'organizations' or the Tenant Id (Obtained from the Azure portal. Select 'Endpoints' from the 'App registrations' blade and use the GUID in any of the URLs), e.g. da41245a5-11b3-996c-00a8-4d99re19f292]
ClientSecret: Specify this property in a user secrets file instead
